name: The Construct
description:
New character - The Construct! 

ENABLE EXTRA FEATURES IN THE MODS MENU!

RECENT CHANGES:
v0.9.992
- Challenge 3 now rebounds ONE random card.
- Challenge 4 added.
- Afterburners uncommon -> rare, now shuffles Burns into draw pile.
- Implosion rare -> uncommon.
- Flammable Fog block 6 -> 5.
- Phosphor Storm damage 8 -> 7.
- Nuclear Core poison 4 -> 3.
- Oil Spill damage 10 -> 9.
- Isolate now doubles next attack's damage, then all damage when upgraded.
- Tumble damage 4(7) -> 3(5), m-upgrade draw 7->5.
- Shield Burst damage 2(3)x -> 1.5(2)x.
- Scrap Cannon mega-upgrade damage 12 -> 17.
- Bugfix: Stasis no longer upgrades Burns.
- Bugfix: Mega-upgrades are no longer lost when loading a run with Conspire installed.
- Bugfix: Flash Freeze updates its text correctly.
- Added portrait-size images for Overheated expansion cards.
